Package space.arim.universal.registry

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Registrable
    Service types must implement or extend this interface in order to be registered.
    Registry
    A framework for registering all services, as well as checking/listing registrations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RegistrationEvent<T extends Registrable>
    Called for the registration of a resource
    RegistryPriority
    Class containing priority constants for referential use

    See Registrable.getPriority()
    UniversalRegistry
    UniversalRegistry: Main class

    Used for retrieving Registry instances:
    * UniversalRegistry.get()
    * UniversalRegistry.getByClass(Class)
    * UniversalRegistry.threadLocal()
    * UniversalRegistry.getOrDefault(Class, Supplier)
